Compatible with iOS 10

Recommended for use with Eclipse, however it is not required.

Erebus is a dark mode for the iOS 10 music app compatible out of the box with Noctis toggling and (semi) ColorFlow support.

Erebus is different from Eclipse because it is made specifically for the music app and supports 3rd party tweaks.

Erebus has a few options:
1. Enable/Disable Switch
2. Noctis Toggle
3. Readable Text (For when used without Eclipse)
4. High Contrast for Readable Text
5. Gradient Removal Option
6. Image Radius Setting
7. Togglefor hiding Arlbum/Artist name

Please note that Erebus may not be compatible on versions 10.0-10.0.1 depending on your configuration.

If you have any questions, follow me on Twitter @clichewow or my Reddit /u/nathanaccidentally. Screenshots one and two and three taken with Eclipse and ColorFlow 3 installed.

4. Finalized ColorFlow 3 support in now playing bar. Full ColorFlow support coming very soon, however I need to manually implement it myself.

Again, thank you so much for using Erebus!
